original_text: My people chose kings to rule them, but they did not ask me about it. They chose people to lead them, but I did not agree. They used their silver and their gold to make idols for themselves. But that will destroy them in the end. My people chose kings to rule them,
korean_text: 그들이 왕들을 세웠으나 내게서 난 것이 아니며 그들이 지도자들을 세웠으나 내가 모르는 바이며 그들이 또 그 은, 금으로 자기를 위하여 우상을 만들었나니 결국은 파괴되고 말리라

sentences.original_text: My people chose kings to rule them
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성이 자신들을 다스릴 왕들을 선택했으나

sentences.original_text: but they did not ask me about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것에 대해 나에게 묻지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They chose people to lead them
They used their silver and their gold
But that will destroy them in the end
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그것은 결국 그들을 파괴할 것이다

sentences.original_text: My people chose kings to rule them
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성이 자신들을 다스릴 왕들을 선택했으나
